mapper.insert: insert into bus_user_receipt (ID, USER_ID, RECIPIENT, PHONE, EXPRESS_NUM, EXPRESS_COMPANY, BILL_TYPE, BILL_HEAD, MONEY, STATUS, ADDRESS, TIME, ADD_TIME, VALID_REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{billHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update bus_user_receipt
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RECIPIENT = #{record.recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_NUM = #{record.expressNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_COMPANY = #{record.expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TIME = #{record.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID_REMARK = #{record.validRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from bus_user_receipt where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and TIME like concat('%',#{searchDate},'%' )
order by ADD_TIME desc

SELECT r.ID,r.USER_ID,r.RECIPIENT,r.PHONE,r.EXPRESS_NUM,r.EXPRESS_COMPANY,r.BILL_TYPE,r.BILL_HEAD,r.MONEY,r.STATUS, r.ADDRESS,r.TIME,r.ADD_TIME,r.VALID_REMARK,u.USERNAME,u.PHONE as USERPHONE FROM bus_user_receipt r,bus_user u WHERE r.USER_ID = u.ID AND r.ID = #{id}
